transport.question: I have wheels and carry many people. I stop at different stops. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am big and yellow in some places
🎟️ You need a ticket to ride me
🚦 I often travel on a set route

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people or cargo. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be very large or small
⚓ I need an anchor to stay in one place
🚢 Pirates used to sail on me

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many passengers. Choo Choo!

hints.text: 🚂 I have a conductor
🛤️ I follow a fixed route
🚊 I can be very long

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places.

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings and engines.
☁️ I fly above the clouds.
💺 Passengers sit inside me

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 I need air in my tires
🧑‍🦽 You might wear a helmet when using me
🚦 I can go on bike lanes.

transport.question: I am a car for hire, and my driver will take you where you want to go.

hints.text: 🚕 I usually have a meter to track the fare.
📍 You can find me at a taxi stand
🚖 Some are yellow.

transport.question: I fly, but I don't have wings. I have spinning blades on top.

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🛩️ I am smaller than an airplane
🏥 I can be used for medical emergencies

transport.question: I'm a vehicle that's pulled by horses. People used me a long time ago.

hints.text: 🐎 I am pulled by horses.
👑 Royalty used to travel in me.
🧱 Sometimes I'm used for scenic rides.

transport.question: I go very fast, sometimes underground, in a big city.

hints.text: 🚇 You can pay to ride me.
🏙️ I usually run under big cities.
⏱️ I can help you avoid traffic.

transport.question: I am designed to travel to space. I take astronauts to the moon.

hints.text: 🚀 I need a lot of fuel to launch.
👩‍🚀 People wear special suits inside me.
🪐 I can explore other planets.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up food.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I meow and love to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I am a common pet.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🐾 I have sharp claws.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones.
🏡 I am known as man's best friend.
🎾 I love going for walks.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse.
🍃 I eat grass and leaves.
🏞️ I run in herds on the savanna.

animal.question: I croak and jump. I like to eat flies. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I live in ponds and lakes.
🐛 I start as a tadpole.
👅 I have a long, sticky tongue.

animal.question: I roar and I'm known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🥩 I am a predator.
🐾 I belong to the cat family.

animal.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
🥬 I like to eat vegetables.
⛱️ I can retract into my shell for safety.

animal.question: I build dams and have large teeth. I like to chew on wood. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am a rodent.
🌊 I live near water.
🐾 I have a flat tail to help me swim.

animal.question: I have a pouch and hop. I live in Australia. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I am a marsupial.
🌿 I eat plants.
🇦🇺 I am a symbol of my country.

animal.question: I slither and have no legs. Some types of me are poisonous. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🥶 I am a reptile and cold-blooded.
